mapper.update: update b_stat set interviewresult=1 where id=#{id};
update b_stat set interviewresult=-1 where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select s.*,u.realname from b_stat s,s_user u where s.phonenumber=u.phonenumber and s.id=#{id};

select CEIL(count(*)/8) from b_stat where 1=1 and isvalid>0
and phonenumber=#{phonenumber}
select count(*) from (select count(phonenumber) from b_stat GROUP BY phonenumber,interviewresult,isvalid HAVING interviewresult=1 and isvalid>0) t
select count(DISTINCT phonenumber) from b_stat where TO_DAYS(interviewtime) = TO_DAYS(now()) and isvalid>0
select FORMAT((select count(*) from b_stat where isvalid>0 and interviewresult=1)/(select count(*) from b_stat),2)*100 AS R
select s.*,u.realname from b_stat s,s_user u where s.phonenumber=u.phonenumber and s.interviewresult=1 and s.isvalid>0 order by realname
select (select count(DISTINCT phonenumber) as a from b_stat) as allcount,(select count(DISTINCT phonenumber) from b_stat where isvalid>0 and interviewresult=1) as successcount
select u.realname,count(s.phonenumber) as count from b_stat s,s_user u where s.isvalid>0 and s.phonenumber=u.phonenumber GROUP BY s.phonenumber,u.realname
select s.*,u.realname from b_stat s,s_user u where s.phonenumber=u.phonenumber and TO_DAYS(s.interviewtime) = TO_DAYS(now()) and s.isvalid>0 order by companyname
